map-obj

Map object keys and values into a new object

Install

$ npm install --save map-obj

Usage

```js var mapObj = require(‘map-obj’);

var newObject = mapObj({foo: ‘bar’}, function (key, value, object) { // first element is the new key and second is the new value // here we reverse the order return [value, key]; }); //=> {bar: ‘foo’} ```
